issue.title: Two unspecified function comparators in [function.objects]

discussion.p: The header <functional> synopsis in contains the following two free comparison operator templates for the function class template

which are nowhere described. I assume that they are relicts before the corresponding two private and undefined member templates in the function template (see and ) have been introduced. The original free function templates should be removed, because using an undefined entity would lead to an ODR violation of the user.

resolution.p: Remove the above mentioned two function templates from the header <functional> synopsis ()

issue.rationale: Fixed by N2292 Standard Library Applications for Deleted Functions.
